response:
Urgent MRI is needed to exclude compression and demonstrate demyelinating lesions. CSF and serum antibody testing differentiate MS from NMOSD/MOGAD. VEP/OCT document optic nerve involvement. Blood tests evaluate mimics and provide safety screening before immunotherapy.
